Dear Mentor Teacher,

You are submitting feedback for the first course organized and co-taught by a new Sahaj Teacher. (If the course was not organized by them, it cannot be used to fulfil the requirements of the TTC). In this course they should have performed Guru Puja, initiated half the participants, and assisted teaching.

Your comments are vital in helping this new teacher to attain their confidence and comfort in teaching, and will assist us also in helping them.

Your feedback is entirely confidential.

Thank you for participating in mentoring this new teacher of Sahaj!

Jai Gurudev!
Sahaj TTC Desk

Dear Mentor Teacher,

You are submitting feedback for the second course organized and co-taught by a new Sahaj Teacher. (Please note that if the course was not organized by them, it cannot be used to fulfil the requirements of the TTC). In this course they should be capable of performing Guru Puja effortlessly and gracefully, initiating at least half of the participants, and stepping in at any point to easily deliver the knowledge.

Your comments are vital in helping this new teacher to attain their confidence and comfort in teaching, and will assist us also in helping them.

Your feedback is entirely confidential.

Thank you for participating in mentoring this new teacher of Sahaj!

Jai Gurudev!
Sahaj TTC Desk

Dear Mentor Teacher,

You are submitting feedback for the third course organized and co-taught by a new Sahaj Teacher. (Please note that if the course was not organized by them, it cannot be used to fulfil the requirements of the TTC). In this course, they should have done most of the teaching, performed Guru Puja, and initiated at least half of the participants. By this time they should be completely relaxed and steady in the knowledge. Guru Puja should be effortless and graceful, and they should be comfortable answering any question that may arise. This course should be primarily taught by them.

Your comments are vital in helping this new teacher to attain their confidence and comfort in teaching, and will assist us also in helping them.

Your feedback is entirely confidential.

Thank you for participating in mentoring this new teacher of Sahaj!

Jai Gurudev!
Sahaj TTC Desk
